name: Help me (SKeagle)
description:
This is our FMP game called Help me

 The player goal is to keep their self confidence high and not let others opinions away your self confidence.

Social justice message: The effect of bullying and the impact on mental health. Which is depression and anxiety. 

Message delivery:  That talking to someone can help you a lot. And that you are not alone even if it feels like it. Because anxiety and depression can cause to feel lonely. Which does affect your personality.

Made by: 

Prince Malonga (programmer)

Trinity Rosales (3D artist)

Wisley Vergara (3D artist)

Miguel Benito (3D artist)
